feed.title: Category: Mega Man 7 | MECHAkunEX Media Diary

entry.title: Game: Mega Man 7 (SNES, 1995)
entry.content:
My son asked for this game today (rather than the next game in our sequence, Mega Man 4.) So I played it for about an hour. I couldn't beat any levels, but I fought Freeze Man and Cloud Man a few times and got all the secret items on their stages. I think I need to invest in Energy Tanks prior to a boss battle.

Total time: 0:51
